By the King. A proclamation for the due payment of the subsidy and aulnage upon all woollen clothes and draperies. England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II) Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty, London : 1660.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall the twenty ninth day of September, in the Twelfth year of Our Reign. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
